com.epam.*

  • com.epam.esm.utils.SqlQueries.GiftCertificatesQueries
    Modifier and Type
    Constant Field
    Value
    public static final String
    GET_ALL_GIFT_CERTIFICATES_BY_TAGS
    "SELECT DISTINCT (gc.id) , gc.name , gc.description, gc.price, gc.duration ,gc.create_date ,gc.last_update_date\n FROM gift_certificate_tags gct \n JOIN tag t \n JOIN gift_certificate gc\n WHERE gc.id = gct.gift_certificate_id AND t.id = gct.tags_id AND t.name IN (?1)\n group by gc.name, (gc.id), gc.description, gc.price, gc.duration, gc.create_date, gc.last_update_date\n having count(t.id) = ?2 \n LIMIT ?3,?4"
    public static final String
    GET_ALL_GIFT_CERTIFICATES_BY_TAGS_
    "Select g from GiftCertificate g left join fetch g.tags t where t.name in :tagSet"
    public static final String
    GET_GIFT_CERTIFICATE_BY_PART_OF_DESCRIPTION
    "SELECT * FROM gift_certificate WHERE description LIKE ?1 LIMIT ?2,?3"
    public static final String
    GET_GIFT_CERTIFICATE_BY_TAG_NAME
    "SELECT gc.id , gc.name , gc.description, gc.price, gc.duration ,gc.create_date ,gc.last_update_date FROM gift_certificate_tags gct JOIN tag t JOIN gift_certificate gc WHERE gc.id = gct.gift_certificate_id AND t.id = gct.tags_id AND t.name = ?1 LIMIT ?2,?3"
    public static final String
    IS_GIFT_CERTIFICATE_EXIST
    "select (count(g) > 0) from GiftCertificate g where g.name = ?1"

    GET_ORDERS_BY_USER_ID

  • com.epam.esm.utils.SqlQueries.TagsQueries
    Modifier and Type
    Constant Field
    Value
    public static final String
    GET_MOSTLY_USED_TAG
    "select t.id, t.name from orders ors\n inner join gift_certificate_tags gt\n inner join tag t\n where ors.gift_certificate_id = gt.gift_certificate_id\n and t.id = gt.tags_id\n and ors.user_id = (SELECT os.user_id FROM orders os,users us\n WHERE os.user_id = us.id\n GROUP BY os.user_id\n ORDER BY SUM(os.cost) DESC\n LIMIT 0, 1)\ngroup by t.id, t.name\norder by count(t.id) desc\nLIMIT 0, 1"
    public static final String
    GET_TAG_ID_BY_TAG_NAME
    "SELECT t.id FROM Tag t WHERE t.name = ?1"
    public static final String
    IS_TAG_EXISTS
    "select (count(t)> 0) from Tag t where t.name = ?1"
